product_name: Pure Organic Fruit and Veggie Strips
long_description: Add a little Pure goodness to your day with the Pure Organic Fruit and Veggie strips. They're made with organic, non-GMO fruit and vegetables with no artificial sweeteners, flavors, or preservatives. 2/3 serving of fruit and veggies combined. Certified organic; non-GMO verified; gluten-free; vegan. Made in a peanut-free facility.
short_description: Add a little Pure goodness to your day with the Pure Organic Fruit and Veggie strips. They're made with organic, non-GMO fruit and vegetables with no artificial sweeteners, flavors, or preservatives.
